name: Esports Life: Ep.1 - Dreams of Glory
description: Esports Life is the first and only pro-gamer simulator including official team licenses. In Episode One: Dreams of Glory, take on the role of an amateur video games enthusiast and become a true electronic athlete.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Intel i3 or equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1GB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 8 GB available space
